name: The power of Trust
description:
This is a game made for the Brackeys Game Jam #2.

Theme: Love is Blind.

The power of trust focuses on a story where you need to sacrifice the love of your powers for the greater good.

Controls:
  • ArrowKeys - AimMove
  • Z/Space - Jump
  • X/LeftClick - Shoot
  • C/RightClick - Dash

A-Skip Dialogue

  • Z-Continue Dialogue
